verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I clasp the hand of love divine, I claim the gracious promise mine, And this eternal counter-sign, "I take—He undertakes."{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I take salvation full and free, Thro’ Him who gave His life for me, He undertakes my all to be, I take—He undertakes.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I take Him as my holiness, My spirit’s spotless, heavenly dress, I take the Lord, my righteousness, I take—He undertakes.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I take the promised Holy Ghost, I take the power of Pentecost, To fill me to the uttermost, I take—He undertakes{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I take Him for this mortal frame, I take my healing thro’ His name, And all His risen life I claim, I take—He undertakes.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I simply take Him at His word, I praise Him that my prayer is heard, And claim my answer from the Lord, I take—He undertakes.{/lang-eng}
